And the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H935>him<s%>, came <S%H5889>weary<s%>, and refreshed themselves <S%H5314>there<s%>.
And <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and Ahithophel with <S%H302>him<s%>.

And it came to <S%H2365>pass<s%>, when Hushai the <S%H757>Archite<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H7463>friend<s%>, was <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, that <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2365>Hushai<s%>, Is this your <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to your <S%H7453>friend<s%>? why <S%H1980>went<s%> you not with your <S%H7453>friend<s%>?
